channel.title: Judge on Steven Verschoot
channel.description: Recent content in Judge on Steven Verschoot

item.title: Rising Star
item.description: Since last spring, I’m no longer a lawyer: I switched sides and currently work as a judge at the Dutch speaking enterprise court of Brussels. Nevertheless, this week I got a nice suprise. [IFLR1000]here, one of the main ’lawyer rankings’, ranked me as a ‘Rising Star’ for the work I used to do as a financial services regulatory lawyer. However relative (being very careful with my words here) these rankings are, actually being ranked is an awesome feeling - prompting nothing but gratefulness: towards my former clients, colleagues and team.
